properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 10:00AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
* WINDS AND WAVES...Strong west winds to 45 mph on Saturday
afternoon and to 35 mph Saturday night will likely produce waves
of 7 to 10 feet occasionally to 13 feet.

* TIMING...Highest waves and winds Saturday afternoon and evening.

* IMPACTS...The increased wave action, combined with ongoing
shoreline erosion may result in additional flooding along
eastern portions of the Porter County lakeshore. The water may
threaten some roads near the lake, including Lakefront Drive in
the Beverly Shores area.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO NOON CST SUNDAY
